author: dlr
msg: A follow-up to r22207, fixing Bourne shell portability.

author: hwright
msg: Refactor code used to find the common ancestors of the src and dst members of a
copy_pair list into a new function.

author: hwright
msg: (error-messages): Add a suggestion to avoid using Subversion-specific

author: dlr
msg: Fix potential infinite loop bug for Windows file systems, where we
fail to detect that an absolute path doesn't actually contain a
repository root, and don't notice our loop exit condition.
(svn_repos_find_root_path): Check whether we've reached the file
system root in a cross-platform manner.
